author: Abhinav Tomar
title: “The Troydan Curse”: Despite Travelling 659 Miles to Watch Pistons “Lose 28 Games”, YouTube Star Catches Celtics Fans’ Ire - EssentiallySports
text: “The Troydan Curse”: Despite Travelling 659 Miles to Watch Pistons “Lose 28 Games”, YouTube Star Catches Celtics Fans’ Ire [](https://bit.ly/4113QfS) Follow Us The Detroit Pistons have become the first team to lose 27 games in a row in one season. The recent 118-112 loss to the Brooklyn Nets made them equal with the poor record of the 2010-11 Cleveland Cavaliers and the 2013-4 Philadelphia 76ers. Now, the Pistons are in Boston trying very hard to stop their 28th straight loss. America’s Favorite Video Today Fans react to “the Troydan curse” When the Pistons went up against the Boston Celtics, a surprising and debatable element came into the story – YouTube star Troydan. From Canada, Troydan caught everyone’s attention when he wore a shirt during the game that said, “I flew from Canada to watch the Pistons lose their 28th game”. The bad luck of the Pistons turned into a show. Fans were angry and called it “the Troydan curse”. ADVERTISEMENT Article continues below this ad this is the level of petty i respect [pic.twitter.com/hVr5oJw8YI] — Jared Weiss (@JaredWeissNBA) [December 29, 2023] Lots of people on social media reacted. Some fans looked shocked, and others were laughing hard. One fan said, “Oh my goodness, the Troydan curse” while others had a laugh Trending Billionaire Michael Jordan Refrained From Paying His Employees With 1 Clever Tactic, NBA Veteran Reveals December 27, 2023 08:32 pm EDT Michael Jordan’s Son Leverages Father’s Christmas Throwback for $6.1 Million Personal Venture December 26, 2023 10:44 am EDT How Rich Is $1.3 Million Worth Angel Reese’s Boyfriend, Cam’Ron Fletcher?
